name: Miner Planets (TOJam 2021 Prototype!)
description:
Credits:

A Monday Night Bischoff production

Director of Fun - Fabio Sacchetti (@drjesusman)

Director of Other Stuff - Antonio Miceli (@megapower_games)

Logo - Sean Browning (@shramper)

Instructions

Welcome to Miner Planets!

The controls are listed on the title screen. Controller only for now.

Instructions are pretty simple:

Work together to navigate the level and find the hidden ship parts! Mine resources in order to properly repair them once they are attached to the ship!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

As Burly: 

As the big beefy Burly, you are a giant brute who shoots first and asks questions later. 

You have the ability to shoot enemies on sight, as well as scan to find resources to fix the ship. While you cannot jump very high due to your massive beefy body, you CAN

grab the necessary ship parts to carry them back to the ship. 

In addition while your partner Ted is using his jetpack you can grab Ted's rope to allow him to lift you

up to hard to reach areas your chicken legs can't reach!

And if you get real creative you can grab your partner Ted and chuck him away to escape a hairy situation!

Once you fix your ship, you will latch on to the ship as it carries you off the planet (defending yourself against the angry aliens)!

As Ted:

As the inquisitive, smart Ted, you rely on your wit and your technology to navigate the landscape. You have a jetpack that can carry you to the far reaches of the landscape, 

and you can transport your partner Burly when ne needs a lift.

You also have a mining drill that you can use to dig through the level and potentially find resources to fix the ship!

Once burly finds a ship part and attaches it to the ship, you can walk to the ship to see what resources you need to fix it, and then go off to find them!

Once you fix your ship, you will need to steer the ship upwards to escape the asteroid!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

You each have your own unique abilities, but together you are a formidable duo. Good luck!
